Marketing Student –Janssen-Cilag A/S
Are you an enthusiastic and creative student in the later stages of your education who wants to make a difference for patients? The

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Marketing Student –Janssen-Cilag A/S

Are you an enthusiastic and creative student in the later stages of your education who wants to make a difference for patients? The Janssen Denmark student positions enable highly motivated students to demonstrate their potential to be one of Janssen’s future leaders.

 

We offer

    • Potential for contract extension
    • An inspiring work environment with a great team
    • Volunteer social activities such as different sports activities, that will strengthen the bond to your colleagues

 

The job

Janssen is the pharmaceutical arm of Johnson & Johnson, the world’s largest healthcare company. Janssen work to create a world without disease. Transforming lives by finding new and better ways to prevent, intercept, treat and cure disease inspires us. Janssen bring together the best minds and pursue the most promising science.

As the new Marketing Student worker you will be assigned a supervisor who will support and guide you. As part of the team, you will gain valuable insights in the business while contributing with innovative ideas. We are looking for someone with a fresh set of skills that can help Janssen shape the future!

The student job will consist of:

    • Together with the Brand Manager, develop and execute an omni-channel brand plan
    • Develop print and digital promotional materials such as creation of e-newsletters, updates of promotional website etc.
    • Align with and collect insight and feedback from the rest of the Brand Team, including Key Account Manager and Medical Advisor, on promotional materials

 

About you

As Marketing Student worker at Janssen you must actively pursue or hold a Bachelor, MBA, or Master’s Degree within Health Economics, Business Administration, Politics & Administration, Medicine or similar. You will have to remain a student throughout the entire employment, so it's ideal if you are in the 2nd or 3rd year of your degree.

Furthermore, you must be legally authorized to work in Denmark, and it’s an advantage if you can both speak and write in Danish.

We expect that you have:

    • Competitive mindset wanting to do better than the competition
    • Natural curiosity and drive
    • Strong business acumen, including critical and strategic thinking, problem-solving
    • Exceptional learning agility and strong drive to shape innovative solutions
    • Experience with digital communication; website set up and links building etc is an advantage
    • Good knowledge of the Microsoft office suite

 

The practical

- Starup: 1st of June until 31st December with the possibility of a contract extension

- Work location: Bregnerødvej 133, 3460 Birkerød (with the possibility of working from home part of the time).

- Work hours: 15 hours a week (2 days a week). The specifics are flexible according to your university schedule.

- Salary 160 DKK/hour

 

We hire on an ongoing basis, so if you are interested in the job please apply via the button.

Janssen-Cilag A/S is collaborating with Experis in this recruitment process, so if you have any questions about the position, please contact Resource Manager, Astrid Gotlieb on tel. 4590 2800 on weekdays between 10:00-14:00.
